originalText.text: Dr Naymagon was amazing. Came to him for a second opinion on my issues and he was very helpful and offered a lot of insight on what the next steps to take should be. I took the trip from New Jersey to see him and was not disappointed. He listens to everything you have to say and make sure to answer all your questions to the best of his ability. I will continue to be in contact with him throughout the rest of my journey.

originalText.text:
Dr. Naymagon is an excellent physician. Very knowledgeable, patient and has a calming demeanor. Good listener and addressed my concerns and answered all my questions. He really cares.
I would highly recommend him.

originalText.text: Dr. Naymagon is a wonderful physican, and very attentive and caring. I am still in the middle of having my daughter diagnosed by him, and he has been kind, responsive, and attune to her needs. Great care!

text.text: Dr. Naymagon is a wonderful physican, and very attentive and caring. I am still in the middle of having my daughter diagnosed by him, and he has been kind, responsive, and attune to her needs. Great care!

originalText.text:
Hi. I recently underwent an endoscapy at Carnegie  Hill Endoscopy, LLC under the supervision of Steven Naymagon, MD. I have been Dr. Naymagon's patient for several years and have always found  him to be thoughtful and informative
without being alarming, while he sets up a clear path to finding cause and treating problems in a careful, kind and inclusive manner. He is the total opposite of the stereotypical arrogant  MD who talks down to patients. I do not often suggest doctors to friends, but I have recommended Dr. Naymagon to several and all have concurred with my assessment.

It seems funny to say, but being in the Carnegie Hill facility, especially if you are actively not feeling so well, is like going on vacation. The place itself is
beautifully appointed, very clean, and designed for efficiency.  The staff is clearly trained to put the patient's comfort first and foremost and is careful to explain what is going on. Everyone was kind, caring, and appropriately upbeat.

Should I require future gastro procedures, I certainly hope that Dr. Naymagon and Carnegie Hill will be on my team.

originalText.text: I am extremely happy with dr. Neymegon. He is always available to answer any questions for me or any concern that i have. He is very patient and understanding. I feel very calm under his care. Thank you. I am so thankful that i found the right place .
